articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts U.S. for Putting on Hold Effectuation of Its Measure
Kim Yong Nam Meets Outgoing Swiss Ambassador
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Swiss Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Outgoing Swiss Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with outgoing Swiss Ambassador to the DPRK Dante Martineli at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Vietnamese
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Swiss Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with outgoing Swiss Ambassador to the DPRK Dante Martineli on Friday.
